summary: The video tells a personal story about the speaker meeting an amazing girl named Anya at an airport last year while traveling through New York City. Despite living in Berlin, the speaker had little hope of seeing her again. However, when offered a job opportunity involving dog sledding in the Arctic Circle near Finland, he saw an opportunity to visit Berlin. The speaker shares how his friend Anya advised him to clean up before meeting Anya again. He gets a haircut at a Vietnamese hair salon, expressing dissatisfaction with his facial hair growth pattern but ultimately liking his new look. Since he owns very few shirts due to his nomadic lifestyle, Anya helps him pick out clothes, though he decides against wearing something too extravagant and opts to be himself. The speaker then listens to an audiobook while heading to Berlin.
